title: How to get a free upgrade at a hotel
text:
How to get a free upgrade at a hotel MICHAEL GEBICKI Last updated 09:15, October 23 2015 iStock 
Don't ask, don't get: Upgrades are always possible at hotel chains. 
Champagne accommodation taste on a beer budget? Just how do you get a hotel room upgrade without paying for it? 
Often, hotels and hotel chains will offer free upgrade specials, so it's wise to keep an eye on deals pages for them. 
But there are other ways, as Emma Fraser, group director of marketing at TFE Hotels, points out. One of those is by being a member of a hotel chain's loyalty program, or registering for email updates. "If you subscribe to the hotel database, you will reap the rewards," says Fraser. "We're in a time where there is so much competition throughout the travel industry, guest recognition is paramount. So it's not just upgrades you benefit from when subscribing to these databases. For example, with TFE Hotels' database, we also reward guests with frequent flyer points, exclusive offers and money off future bookings, as well as the added bonus of no booking fees. Ultimately, the better your relationship is with any individual hotel, the better the benefits are for you, so it's definitely worth the additional effort." READ MORE:
